record.dc:title: 44JE1 Fains Island Site 1JE1, Jefferson County, Tennessee. Village site excavation south of mound showing Feature 6, Clay fire basin, two feet above hardpan, indicating multiple occupation. Direction south.
record.wpa:narrative: Top of basin above H.P. 1.8'. Top of basin below ground surface 1.1'. Basin filled with hard gray wood ashes. Sides - hard baked red clay. Group - circular - stone cracked beneath basin (See Base Chart).
record.wpa:comments: Base Chart on file at the institution. See also photograph 43JE1 [fhm01462]
